description: Explore Hvar by stand up paddle (SUP) board and discover this extraordinary sport. Our instructors will show you how to make your first steps on the board or show you the best places to go.
Experience the Makarska Riviera on this private sailing day tour. Enjoy a glass of sparkling wine, then sail to Hvar or Brač island, swim and snorkel, and relax surrounded by scenic beauty.
Adventure unlike any other with a climbing experience that will take your breath away.

Enjoy an unforgettable horseback riding experience as you ride along the coastline and mountain terrain from Podstrana. Explore an ancient Roman trail along the peninsula surrounded by breathtaking nature on this horseback riding activity.
Discover the famous Blue Cave, Mamma Mia town Komiža, and secret beaches on this speedboat tour. Explore hidden parts of the 5 islands and swim in pristine turquoise lagoons.
Explore 5 islands in the Adriatic Sea on a 10-hour tour of Hvar, Biševo, Vis, Budikovac, and Pakleni. Go to the Blue Cave and admire its natural beauty and stunning beaches.
Escape from Hvar's hustle and bustle with a sailing adventure on this tour to the Pakleni islands. Spend the day taking in stunning landscapes, snorkeling in clear waters, and paddle boarding.
Sail by catamaran to Hvar and Pakleni Islands. Explore Hvar's old town and stop to swim in peaceful bays before returning to Split as the sun sets.
Head on an adventurous small-group or private 5-island tour by speedboat, including snorkeling in pristine blue waters, a visit to the charming village of Komiža, and sightseeing in Hvar.
